## RedisClientAdapter class

Redis client wrapper that implements IRedisClient interface Wraps ioredis client to provide unified interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class RedisClientAdapter implements IRedisClient 
```
**Implements:** [IRedisClient](./koatty_schedule.iredisclient.md)
